meanings.definition: A polycyclic aromatic heterocycle consisting of a phenazine ring system fused with two benzene rings.
meanings.english_definition: A polycyclic aromatic heterocycle consisting of a phenazine ring system fused with two benzene rings.

etymology.value: Derived from the combination of "di-" (meaning two), "benzo-" (referring to benzene rings), and "phenazine" (the parent heterocyclic compound).

readability_explanation.text: This term is highly technical and specific to organic chemistry. It would primarily be encountered in advanced chemistry texts and research papers.
